DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this clinical trial is to describe safety, tolerability and the course of parameters of the immune system during administration of different doses of two subcutaneously administered mistletoe preparations (Iscucin populi and Viscum Mali e planta tota) in healthy volunteers, compared to placebo.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Immunological Effects of Two Mistletoe Preparations in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: 1845 years. Healthy volunteers Any disease except hay fever. Smoking. Drug abuse. Pregnancy
